unsaved_changes.title: Unsaved Changes
unsaved_changes.question: Are you sure you want to leave this page and lose them?

ad-blocker.ad-blocker-desc:
Your browser is using an ad blocker.
To ensure Unity functions properly, please turn off the ad blocker.
(Open the extension settings and select the option to "disable for this site")

default_locale.description: It looks like your browser is using {{browserLocale}} locale. Would you like to use the same settings in Unity?
default_locale.update_success: Locale set to {{locale}}. You can always change it in your Profile settings.

advertiser.multi_markets_tooltip: You can now restrict campaign information to a single market by clicking on Market in the drop down menu beside your name.

import.importing: Import in progress. Wait a while...
import.failed: We're unable to communicate with the server right now. Please try again.

session.message: Please re-login to renew your session

validation.required_first_last_names: First and last names are required.
validation.invalid_password: This is not a valid password.
validation.invalid_email: This is not a valid email address.
validation.does_not_meet_requirements: Your input does not match the requirements.
validation.forbidden_characters: This name contains characters which are not allowed. Please revise the name to include only alphanumeric characters.
validation.wrong_css_characters: Please use only characters allowed according to CSS specification.
validation.invalid_date: This is not a valid date.
validation.invalid_time: This is not a valid time.
validation.invalid_date_time: This is not a valid datetime.
validation.invalid_local_date_time: This is not a valid local datetime.
validation.invalid_number: This is not a valid number.
validation.invalid_color: This is not a valid color.
validation.invalid_range: This is not a valid range.
validation.invalid_month: This is not a valid month.
validation.invalid_url: This is not a valid URL.
validation.date_is_not_after_start_date: The date provided must be no earlier than {{ startDate }}.
validation.date_is_not_before: The date must be no later than {{ date }}.
validation.date_is_not_after: The date must be no earlier than {{ date }}.
validation.datetime_is_not_after_start_date: The datetime provided must be no earlier than start datetime.
validation.does_not_meet_min_length: Your field must have at least {{ requiredLength || minlength }} characters.
validation.does_not_meet_max_length: Your field must have a maximum of {{ requiredLength || maxlength }} characters.
validation.does_not_meet_min_time: The time provided must be no earlier than {{ attrs.min |date: 'HH:mm' }}.
validation.does_not_meet_max_time: The time must be no later than {{attrs.max |date: 'HH:mm’}}.
validation.does_not_meet_min_date: The date provided must be no earlier than {{attrs.min | date:'dd.MM.yy’}}.
validation.does_not_meet_max_date: The date must be no later than {{attrs.max |date: 'dd.MM.yy’}}.
validation.more_then_max: The value must not be greater than {{ max }}.
validation.less_then_min: The value must not be less than {{ min }}.
validation.number_decimals_exceed: The number must have a maximum of {{ maxDecimals }} decimals.
validation.number_integer_exceed: The number must have a maximum of {{ maxIntegerPart }} in integer part.
validation.date_should_be_after: The date provided must be no earlier than {{ value | cadDate: 'mediumDateShortTime' }}.
validation.exceed_period: This is not a valid period - it cannot exceed {{ cadValidatePeriodDays }} days.
validation.passwords_do_not_match: The passwords you entered do not match.
validation.password_between: Password between {{ ngMinlength }} and {{ ngMaxlength }} characters is required.
validation.username_between: Username between {{ ngMinlength }} and {{ ngMaxlength }} characters is required.
validation.user_name_not_unique: User with such username already exists.

audit_trail.no_data: No change log data on this {{name}}

forbidden.no_permissions_desc:
You do not have sufficient permissions to access this page.
Please contact our support to request access if needed.

404.title: Page not found
404.text: The page you are looking for cannot be viewed because it does not exist.

500.title: Something went wrong
500.text: The page you are looking for cannot be viewed because it does not exist.

400.title: Bad request
400.text: The page you are trying to access can not be displayed.

support.support_request_desc: Submit your request to the Helpdesk.
support.subject: Subject
support.request_sent_desc: Your request has been submitted. We will provide our feedback soon.
support.sending_error: We're unable to communicate with the server right now. Please try again.

upload_screenshot.file_details: Please select JPG or PNG file up to 5 Mb
upload_screenshot.limitation: You can attach 1 screenshot per request

background_processes.dismiss_warning: Changes you have made to the {{name}} were not pushed to DSP and will be lost if you dismiss this message.
background_processes.dismiss_confirmation: I understand that all unsaved changes will be lost.
